Title: Object: Lieut. Colonel Patrick Macleod
Description: Standing three-quarter length, with one hand on his hip, the other on a sheet on a table on which stands a vase awarded by the Patriotic Fund of Lloyds; open letter proof. 1809 Mezzotint
Bibliographic references: Chaloner Smith 1883 / British Mezzotinto portraits from the introduction of the art to the early part of the present century (50.I)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: William Meriton Eaton, 2nd Baron Cheylesmore
